api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

sso_addr.description: This is the IP address user uses to access the server. Example: '127.0.0.1'. This can also be $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] if this script is ran by user

sso_duration.description: Optionally, you can provide the duration of his token (in minutes; default is 15). Example: 30

sso_user.description: this is the user you are logging in as. Example: 'admin'
